# Colors

```{r colors, echo=FALSE}
div(
  .style %>% display("flex"),
  lapply(names(border_color_), function(color) {
    div(
      .style %>%
        padding(4) %>%
        margin(3) %>%
        border(color),
      color
    )
  })
)
```

# Radii

```{r radii, echo=FALSE}
div(
  .style %>% display("flex"),
  lapply(names(border_radius_), function(radius) {
    div(
      .style %>%
        padding(4) %>%
        margin(3) %>%
        border("blue", radius = radius),
      radius
    )
  })
)
```
